resources.string: The Mobile Quizzing is an android application that provides a new technique of Playing Quiz using mobile phones. This application is especially developed for People who like to play challenging Quiz. The project provides an effective challenge to the player. The system has an admin login that has overall control over Question and Answer in the Server. Admin feed the Question and Answer in to the System. These questions are randomly picked and sent on users android devices . User have to first create an account into the system for playing quiz. At the end of the Quiz the system checks all the answer and generates a brief report card .
